'--------------------------------By-Minzsec------------------------------
D4arker is my version of an all-in-one dorking tool written in pure bash. It leverages Google AND Bing main search pages to scrape a large amount of links based on provided search terms. You can choose to search a single dork at a time or you can make lists with one dork per line and perform mass scans. Once your done with that, or maybe you have links gathered from other means, you can move to the Analyzing tools to test for common signs of vulnerabilities. The results are neatly so
